recipies.ingredients: basmati rice, marinated meat or chicken, browned onions, cilantro, mint, yogurt, saffron, ghee and spices.
recipies.description:
Fried Onions: Slice onions very finely and fry until crisp and light golden brown.  Onions thinly sliced for frying.   Crispy fried onions for making the recipe. 
Chicken Marination: Combine chicken with all marinade ingredients, ⅓ fried onions and ground biryani spice blend.  Chicken, yogurt and ginger garlic paste combined to marinate. 
Rice Preparation: Rinse basmati rice until clear. Soak ⅓ cup rice in water. Cook remaining rice in rice cooker.  Preparing rice for lentil cranberry rice recipe. 
Assemble Rice and Chicken Layers: Transfer chicken with marinade to a cooking pot. Top with chopped cilantro, mint, half lemon juice, some olive oil and most of the remaining fried onions.  All the marinade ingredients, spices, herbs, chili peppers placed together for making the rice dish. 
Add Soaked Rice: Drain and spread it over the chicken.  A thin layer of raw soaked rice sprinkled over the chicken and marinade. 
Final Rice Layer: Layer all cooked rice. Top with remaining fried onions, lemon juice, saffron water and ghee over the rice.  Layers of rice placed over the chicken marinade. 
Steaming: Cover with parchment paper, followed by aluminum foil and fit the lid tight over it. Bake in oven for one hour, until steam builds up well.  The lid placed over aluminum sheets and sealed tightly to steam the rice and chicken. 
On Stove top: Alternatively, heat biryani at medium high for 10 to 15 minutes and then simmer at low for one hour until steam builds up well.
Cool biryani for five minutes. Gently mix rice and chicken and serve.
